alert.note: Alert for George; Perry; Stone (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 22 at 2:39PM CDT until August 23 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING ISSUED FOR STONE, GEORGE, AND PERRY COUNTIES TODAY AND WEDNESDAY DUE TO A COMBINATION OF HIGH KBDI VALUES & SIGNIFICANTLY INCREASING DROUGHT CONDITIONS... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR STONE, GEORGE, AND PERRY COUNTIES IN SOUTHEASTERN MISSISSIPPI... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM CDT WEDNESDAY FOR STONE, GEORGE, AND PERRY COUNTIES IN SOUTHEASTERN MISSISSIPPI... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 075, 078 and 079. * WINDS...East 5 to 10 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 28 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
